titleStmt.title: A preparation vnto fasting and repentance. By Peter Moulin, and translated by I.B.
Preparation à jeune et repentance. English
titleStmt.author: Du Moulin, Pierre, 1568-1658.
J. B. (John Bulteel), d. 1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. S[nodham] for Nathaniel Newbery, and are to be sould at the signe of the Starre vnder S. Peters Church in Cornehill, and in Popes head ally,

notesStmt.note: The Folger Shakespeare Library copy has two settings of the title page: with "B" in line 6 under and between the "L" of "Moulin" (A2r) and with the "B" in line 6 under the "N" of "Moulin" (E12r; possibly intended as a cancel)--STC.
Identified as STC 7336a on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Starre vnder S. Peters Church in Cornehill
